パッケージ com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bukkit

クラス BukkitConfig

java.lang.Object
com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bukkit.BukkitYaml
com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bukkit.BukkitConfig
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
Configuration, FileConfiguration, Yaml
public class BukkitConfig
extends BukkitYaml
This class extends BukkitYaml to use plugin resources.

Using null for @NotNull argument will cause a NullPointerException.

  • コンストラクタの詳細

    • BukkitConfig

      public BukkitConfig​(@NotNull @NotNull Plugin plugin, @NotNull @NotNull String fileName, boolean resource)
      Creates an BukkitConfig with given yaml file.

      This constructor loads the file automatically. The file path to load or create is /plugins/PLUGIN_NAME/FILE_NAME

      パラメータ:
      plugin - A plugin instance.
      fileName - Loads or creates file name.
      resource - If the file does not exist, should it be copied from the plugin jar.

  • メソッドの詳細

    • load

      public boolean load()
      Loads a yaml file.

      If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one. At that time, copy from plugin jar if resource is true.

      定義:
      load インタフェース内 FileConfiguration
      オーバーライド:
      load クラス内 BukkitYaml
      戻り値:
      True if the load is successful or false if it is failure.
